content.detailedDescription:
About 906pm isaw a triangualr shape in western sky just the color got my atention yellowish gold fire went in and said to the girls check out whats in the sky what got my atention is the shape n collor right away i new it wasnt and everyday akurrce seeing a tryagald  shape flying around.The ufo was flying very slow n the objeks were rotating around and 1 point were n ariow.My feelings were shck but new i witness a sighting few get to see.My reaction was no one going to belive me.I hope u make this acountable becuse i no what we saw.Iit floow right over me thene the resterant china sity blocked my sight    p                                     






























                                                       ffling                                                                                   sky              y
content.summary: Ufofiles remined me of that program  was not flairs e.T  i belive space never ends u got 2 be dum u think were alone              ho

content.detailedDescription: The sparkling was like the sparks from a fire when the little burned bits fall back to the ground and burn out , my kids also stood a watched"look at the star mommy" trying to explain that it's not a star  lol. so four of us saw it. two adults and two kids. ages 4 and 3 , 26 and 31.  not the first time we see one. another instance i can think of is we saw one again at this address this summer it directed itself in front of our front door at this address again this time it also stopped and hovered for a long time , maybe 10 min or so , this one was silver none reflective unknown identity but it was sort of oval shaped with white light emitting from exterior and it also had a sort of reactor or propulsion system that was on only one side of it and it also had this type of fire sparkle looking stuff... again staying there long enough for me to get great detail.. didn't have a camera with me this time wish i would have because it wasnt more then 100 feet from me up over the front of my house. could see enoty inside but not enoug to distinguish it, i really hope they coe again and take me for a ride yehaa ;) peace namaste
content.summary: Standing from child's bedroom window before bed time and observed a glowing pulsating yellowish white light , stood there long enough to take two pic's but neither turned out then it faded away quickly with a light sparkle like from a fire when....

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front balcony with my room-mate, when i saw this blue glowing orb moving sporadically in the sky. when it moved it left a trail behind it like when you move a flashlight in a photograph. i thought " i must be crazy, this is the weirdest thing i have ever seen". it only lasted a few seconds and i never returned.
content.summary: Glowing blue light

content.detailedDescription: 3 bright orange glowing lights moving in all directions, then very low, and rising up, and vanishing. i was at my house, far away from the observed lights, at least 10 miles, but they were very clear. i noticed them because they were so bright, and it appeared as though they were changing directions oddly. i went back out and they had disappeared, only to reappear again. i am not positive how long they were there before i noticed them, but they stayed for about 15-20 minutes, until they rose up to a higher altitude and seeminglt vanished, and then did not return to sight. however, when the lights did go off, i could see faintly the object moving, like a faint star, scross the sky where the light had been. the lights faded a few times, and reappeared, but the final time they did not return. i thought it was helicopters, but they were moving fairly quickly closer together and farther apart, up and down, and the lights did not flash like a helicopter, it was mostly a consistent glow.
content.summary: 3 bright orange glowing lights moving in all directions, then very low, and rising up, and vanishing

content.detailedDescription: Finished up playing basketball with siblings. my bro was on his cell phone a bright blue light caught his eye. we saw that it was a ufo. it was almost as high as an airplane about 100-200 feet away from us it was very fast hovered slowly for 00:30 seconds or so. it would hover down and up and around the costco store and across the street where we were it flew over the same parking lot we were in. it had 8 red circles on the bottom and 6 bright blue lights on the top of it, it was round it had brake lights so it might be some kind of government air force test on new top secret technology...  it  disappeared and reappeared once it. we lost it when it disappeared for good. i'll try and put the footage we took of it on youtube our channel is [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Jan 24th 2012 cypress, ca

content.detailedDescription: At 7pm on january 24,2012 i received a phone call from a friend that was20 miles from me and he said he was looking at  a ufo above his house.  i went outside and to the west i saw about ten spheres moving ereadically with flashing white lights.  these lights moved in all directions including around each other.  the night sky was so clear it was only the second time i was able to see milky way with bare eyes.  2 minutes after going outside my wife joined me outside and to our south she pointed out a large triangle shaped object with 3 lights on each tip.  the object was only a quarter mile above the ground and it was traveling very slowly and noiseless.  we watched this triangle continue its path due west and after 5 minutes or more, just as it was almost out of sight it began returning in our direction and passed by my house again now to my north watching it for a total of 15 minutes.  i live on a dead end street and had people on my road trying to chase it down.  just as i lost sight of it for the first time it was about to go ver the ocean. at my house here we are lucky to have a very good unobstructed view for miles in all directions without trees even interfering.  we live on a dead end road with only 3 homes past mine and the road is not finished yet because it has not been developed.  the only cars to pass my house daily are the people living on my road, but while this was going on,at one point had 11 vehicles turning around.  we did not hear noise or smells.  20. minutes after loosing site of everything  i began to hear helicopters around my area. i went back outside and saw 3 helicopters with 1 other one that was quite large. and appeared to be using a spotlight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shape with 3lights along with many single spheres in sky

content.detailedDescription: This is our 4th positive sighting of these orbs in the past 3 years with 3 of the 4 seen over water. at 7:45 pm we noticed the orb hovering around 500-1000 foot above safety harbor and emitting a red cone shaped beam of light down at the water. we live very close to several airports both private fields, international, coast guard  and an air force base so we are very familiar with air craft and helicopters of all shapes and sizes. this orb had no navigation lights only an amber glow masking its actual shape and size. i have found these and other craft are attracted to green lasers and actually carry one with me and once i confirmed the object was not an aircraft with required legal lighting i painted the object with my laser. the object appeared not to like the attention and turned red for a second and then went dark but the object was still there for a couple more seconds as my laser would reflect off its surface then it disappeared in an unknown direction. the orbs are always silent and seem to be trying to camouflage them selves as conventional aircraft, stars or lights. i personally believe they hide in the water during the day and come out from dusk till dawn.
content.summary: Orb / fireball craft emitting red beam down into water

content.detailedDescription: We were walking outside along the ocean in corona del mar at about 840 on a clear evening when we saw a bright orange light travelling from north to south.  it is hard to judge the scale of the object since it was dark, but it appeared to be just several hundred yards off the coast at about 40 degrees and ascending.  the object eventually disappeared.  it was hard to tell if it disappeared out of sight due to rapid descent or if the lights were turned off.  after seeing this first object, we went in to get a camera and captured video of two more lights.  a fourth followed after the two seen in the video.  there is a white light in the video which is venus.  you'll see in the middle of the video that the top object moves to the right of the other.
content.summary: Orange lights spotted above big corona state beach in newport beach, ca

content.detailedDescription: I looked up in the sky over my head one day in august 2007 and the sky was clear with large cumulus clouds.  i spotted a contrail coming from a craft or ufo.  the ufo was heading straight up at an angle to my left at about 11 oclock.  at the time i spotted it, it was probably under 20,000 ft altitude.  it was a conical shaped craft that was a little bigger than what you would see on the top of a saturn 5 rocket. the shape was probably a little more skinny than the saturn 5 module.  the best way i can describe it is to say it was similar to the mcdonnell douglass delta clipper. it had a polished metallic appearance exterior and the sunlight would flash off of its reflective skin as it moved.  its speed was not too fast or too slow but about what you see commercial jets flying at.  the contrail was a white continuous stream with clear and crisp white rings at a constant frequency (donuts on a rope).  i saw these rings popping out of the exhaust of the ufo and it was maybe 1 every 1-3 seconds id say -not too fast or too slow.  the rings appear like actual rings unlike some of the photos i've seen on the internet about this subject.  i kept watching this craft as it increased in altitude to probably above 60k feet where i couldnt see it any more.  also, to the right i saw 2 other ufos that were of the same shape and design which were ascending at a similar speed to the first.  they appeared to the upper right or at the 1 oclock position of me and these were at a lower altitude at first (staged lower from the first ufo).  however, these two which looked like they were side by side had no exhaust whatsoever that i could see.  again i kept watch of these 2 ufos until i could not see them as they disappeared into the upper atmosphere traveling at a steep angle opposite of the first ufo.
content.summary: 3 conical shaped ufos with 1 ufo having a "donuts on a rope" contrail

content.detailedDescription:
I want to share with you with some of my experiences for which i have been desperately looking answers. i had many unusual experiences throughout my life which i think are unexplainable. i have been thinking since long time to talk to someone professional regarding this but never had the courage to do so. 

i am 28 years old punjabi girl, basically from mumbai, living in australia since 3 years for study.
 
the first unusual experience i had during my childhood, i don���t remember the exact year, but i think i was 10-11 years old at that time.  that night, i went to sleep as usual, when i got up i had very strange memories about being carried away by someone in space. they took me with them while i was sleeping; i was walking with them. i can���t remember the faces of the beings, but they were similar to humans as i have very blurred vision about that. i was laid down, and they inserted something on my collar bone. they pushed it inside my skin using long, thin needle-like equipment. it was painful. when i got up in the morning, for 10-20 minutes i was stunned and thinking about what happened last night.  i couldn���t believe that anything like that can happen; as i never heard anything like that i thought it was just a bad dream. i remember, i was looking through the window, and i thought it is not possible for someone to come from the sky as there was so less gap between the two buildings.  then i went to look up in the mirror, i saw there is a scar on my collar bone. i was very scared, and couldn���t believe it was true. i tried to convince myself what i think about the scar is not true, and the memories i remember was just a bad dream.

after that, i started getting depressed about things and lost interest in studying. i was thinking suicidal at that time, lost interest in living in this world. i had bad nightmares and was too scared to go to school. i hurt myself by cutting my hand with blades, pen. my parents took me took to psychiatrist and after some time my health was improved. 

after 2- 3 years of depression, i was good , i got very fat due to my over-eating in depression, i became like 90 kgs, i made up my mind and i lost 40 kgs in one year. i worked in film industry as a junior artist for some time, and then i started studying again and still studying.

i had some unusual experiences like feeling of knowing something before, out of body experiences but i never paid much attention to these things as i didn���t really want to think about those things. 

in the year 2008, i was travelling to go to 2 institutes to enquire about a course. while i was travelling, i suddenly started feeling happy and my mind said me that today you are going to get a job offer from an institute. when i went to the first institute, the counselor really offered me a job offer. i was truly amazed at that time, and felt how can a feeling become true. i was also puzzled that it was a feeling or a message by someone.

then in the end of the year 2009, my brother was engaged with a girl and they were together since 7-8 months and were soon going to get married. everything was going good and preparations for the marriage were started at my house.  a week before the marriage, i got a vision; i can't really explain that vision. it was more like a feeling or message, and what i interpreted from that message was that my brother will not get married and i uttered those words from the mouth. during that message, i also saw a monkey like being.  my husband was also sitting with me when this thing happened and he heard what i said. then i just got confused of what i said and i told my husband why i am feeling bad about my brother, i shouldn���t be thinking like that. i felt it was just a thought of mind and nothing else. but the next day, i got a call from my father that my brother���s engagement is broken and he is not going to get married. it was shocking as it shows there is some kind of connection between mind and reality.
in the year 2010, one day i was just sitting and feeling sad about mother and don���t know why i was feeling like it. after few hours a call from my mom on my phone, and i was just too scared to attend that call. i started crying in front of my husband and told him it is a bad news, i don���t want to hear the bad news. i am normal and have never done anything like this crazy before without any valid reason. i don���t know why i behaved like that. i talked to my mom for an hour or so and was so happy that my mom is good and nothing really has happened to her. but then after 2 days i got a call from home, again that feeling started. i thought to ignore the feeling and attended the call. this time my brother was calling to give bad news about my mom. she had a stroke, she was serious and hospitalized. i was very sad to hear this news, and was pretty confused about the connection between the mind and reality.

the above stated are the most prominent ones, other than that i had out of body experiences a couple of times that i remember.

the situation at present is that i am puzzled about life and reality. health wise presently, sometimes i can feel some kind of pressure in the middle of the eyebrows flowing towards the nose. i got swelling in my legs; especially my left knee is swollen and painful since 2 years, also i feel very tired even after doing light work. i am not sure whether these symptoms are related to the abduction or not but i am more concerned about the scar i have. i would like to further investigate into this matter but have no idea where to start and who will be the best person to contact regarding this matter. 

i have attached the pictures of the implant scar; it is right over my collar bone. please ignore the stretch marks near the scar, as i got that after losing my weight. any help regarding this will be appreciated.
content.summary: This is regarding a alien abduction case which i experienced many years back in india, i got a scar on the collar bone after waking up from bed.

content.detailedDescription: On this night i had some buddies over for a visit. i live on the out skirts of a town called belvidere in illinois, out in the open country farm area's. there were four of us there. it was a very warm summer night. i had my guitar outside and plugged into an amp and was jamming some tunes for my friends. we were having some beers and just enjoying the night since it was the weekend. the sky was very clear and the stars were all around. my my were there going on about six hours and it was getting to be around 2:00 a.M. in the morning. my mother and step father were out of town and i was staying home alone. we had dairy cows at the time and a corn field on our farm. the sky was still very clear but wind started blowing as if a storm was approaching but no signs of clouds anywhere. the cows in the barn started acting funny pacing and making mooing noise's, as if something was spooking them. one of my friends decided to leave because it was late and he didn't want to get caught in the storm that he thought was coming. so he looked up at the sky puzzled and said, " that's strange how there are no clouds around and looks and feels stormy ". he then said, " later dude's!", and drove off. just after he left my other two friends said they were gonna take off also and started pulling out my drive way witch is kinda long before you get to the main road. as they were pulling out i noticed something dark and big just kinda hovering over one of our three corn bin's. i quickly ran to the porch light switch and started flickering the lights so my friends would see what i was seeing but they didn't notice the thing and just honked the car horn and yelled, " later man ". so i then put down my guitar and still had a beer in my right hand, and no! i wasn't drunk. i was really seeing this thing, and started walking up to the corn bin thinking, what the heck. i saw it was very large and black in color and was like a triangle shape and it had some lights going around it on the three tips of the shape and one on the bottom that seemed to be getting brighter as i watched it. then just like in a second, a bright white light came out from the bottom and was blinding me from seeing. then the next thing i knew the light was going back up to the object and then it took off in a flash like a match blowing out. the next thing is even stranger. it was like 2:00 a.M. and dark outside when this was occurring but when i was able to focus my eye's from after that brightness, the sun was coming up and it was dawn and going on around 6:00 a.M.? and the beer i was holding in my right hand was now in my left hand.? i swear, i never switched them. i don't know why there was four hours missing and don't remember anything from the time i saw the object to the time it just took off. i had bad dreams after that some nights about being on a table in a strange place and seeing these beings with big black eye's just looking at me on this table. i wake up sweating and scared. i thought i would share this now because it has always been on my mind and this site gave me this chance to tell it. thank you so much for reading my report. chuck m. from belvidere, illinois..:)
content.summary: Ufo sighted and possible abduction!

content.detailedDescription:
Over 25 triangular ufo's stationary in the sky with white glowing light. (2) at lower elevations spinning and changing colors as they spun from glowing white,to yellowish orange then it dissapeared then reappeared while spinning moving rapily across the sky in a straight line lights on the exterior line of triangular shape. inside no lights clear.

what is going on? why are people pretending nothing is going on?
content.summary: Rotating triangular lights turning white, orange, disappearing and reappearing in the sky with no sound at varying distances in the sky look toward the big dipper.  stationary ones in a circular pattern. one is near the moon obvious.

content.detailedDescription:
around 6:45 pm on 1-19-2012, i was coming home from work.  i noticed 20 plus round bluish orbs fly horizontally across the sky.  they were flickering.  they almost looked like fireworks.  i heard no sound.  i called my wife who was already in doors to come outside.  she observed them also. they gradually spread apart and began moving around in small circles and disappeared slowly.  this event took around 5-6 minutes before they all vanished.  
     shortly later, my wife and i were at the dinner table eating.  we heard a low humming or rumbling outside.  my wife actually heard or noticed the noise first.  she stated, "what is that?"  "go outside and see!"  i went outside as my wife followed behind me.  i immediately looked north.  i saw an object that i could not make out at first, not very far from me. it was in the sky but was flying fairly low for an aircraft. i asked my wife, "is that a jet?"  it could not be a jet flying so low and  hovering slowing like it was.  it did not fly like one at all. it was above tree top level and way above the houses in our subdivision. it appeared to hover and made no major noise, just a low hum.  it was in the shape of a triangle.  as it came closer,the body of the craft appeared to be very dark, almost transparent.  it had a bright red blinking light on the bottom of the craft.  it had three white lights on each end.  that is how we made it out to be a triangle and while lights on each tip.  it had a dark shadow also like something was there.  it looked like an invisible triangle with a red blinking light on the bottom.  it appeared to be in a turn as it seemed to notice us.  it turned around and moved over toward us.  it was still low but over tree top level.  it was pretty big.  as the object did a complete circle around our area of the neigborhood we notice an identical craft descend out of the sky.  it seemed to have come from no were.  it was flying and descending from a higher altitude from the southwest going north toward the first craft we saw.  we became very scared at this point.  we were frightened by the first but became very scared when we saw the second craft.  i thought there may be some type of invasion honestly.  we ran back toward the house until the second craft passed on. the craft met up with the other craft and they began to fly off in a straight path toward highway 40 which is in view from our house.  they did not change directions anymore.  i watched them for 10-15 minutes.  they flew over highway 40 toward the north.  they flew over a few manufacturing buildings that are in view across the interstate. i watched them until all i could see were the red blinking dome lights on them.  they eventually faded out of view as they flew further on.  those red blinking lights were so bright they could be seen for over a mile away. my wife and i have been nervous for the past several days.  it has been 6 days since we had this sighting.  i did not notice anyone else outside that may have seen it.  i immediately contacted mufon nc.  i just need to talk to someone.  my wife and i are still frightened by it but have come to terms with it.  i have told my family members only. 1-25-2012 at 9:34 pm.
content.summary: Trangle shaped craft with red pulsating light on bottom center of craft

content.detailedDescription:
November 17th, 1990 at approx 6pm (or shortly before) in houghton county (in the u.P.) michigan, in the location east of golden glow road and south of m-28 and west of the jumbo river. it was dusk and the ski was still light. no clouds visible and it was light enough that we did not need a flashlight to see where we were walking.

my dad and i had been deer hunting that evening. at dusk, my dad came to get me from my blind and then we headed back towards my dads blind, to take the main trail out of the woods. as soon as we came to the clearing just about 50 ft from my dads blind, there were 3 bright lights hovering just above the treeline above my dads blind and to the right. between the two lights to the right, looked like a pipe shaped craft with the bright lights at each end. to the left looked to be another free standing light, just as bright as the other two. the lights were as bright as car headlights and seems to be shining towards us.

my dad then brought his rifle up to look at them through his scope. just then, the lights slowly dimmed and when out. the craft seemed to have completely vanished, without ever moving. there was no sound, no wind and no clouds. we could still clearly see the sky. 

later, as we approached out vehicle, we could hear a jet fly nearby. we are not sure if they were looking for what we had just seen.
content.summary: Pipe shaped craft with lights on each end. there was another single 3rd light to the left

content.detailedDescription: Since june 20th ive been seeing and photographing a ufo disc shaped object in broad daylight. it started while i was in my backyard smoking a cigarette when i got a strange but powerful urge to look up and i saw something silvery moving through the clouds then i decided to take a few pictures and in one of the pics there it was i thought at first it could have been a bird so i take more pics this time i made sure the sky was clear when a plane was passing by i took a couple of pics, clearly all i saw was the plane but going back to the pic i saw a second object next to the plane and i zoom and see it is clearly a disc, this continued and still happens i also had many sightings where i would see it and take pictures but there would be nothing i have about 60 photos and 170 sightings. jan 18 2012 i observed this disc hovering over new york harbor and on jan 24 2012 i was in central park and i got the same strange powerful urge to take pictures and i did not see the object only when i looked at the picture there it was
content.summary: Ufo disc hovering over new york harbor

content.summary: Ufo disc hovering over new york harbor

content.detailedDescription:
1. my wife and i were on our way home from rochester.   2. we saw a very bright light that was above the cascade river valley. we stopped at the golf course club house and watched the object hovering up the valley from us somewhere from a half to to a mile away. 3. we thought the it was a star or planet until we got closer. 4. it just sat there and blinked its lights.
5. we just tried to process what this could be with no sound or motion. i took the wife home and i went back with the field glasses 10x, they showed that the item would tip occasionally. and the lights would come on and off.
6. i then went toward byron on the road to try and get to a crossing with it. it started to move and i was not able to intercept it. it just glided of at a constant altitude and velocity-- last seen going west.
content.summary: A large object with very bright lights hovered over cascade creek for 45 min.

content.detailedDescription: Along with several friends sat on the sidewalk to rest after playing all afternoon and talk. we spent an hour talking about ufos, and then another 30 minutes talking about the pyramids. most of my friends was about 11 years, my older friends were between 15 to 16 years. when our mothers called us to go home, some look at the sky and some of my younger friends said it was small flying saucer, old friends said it was a plane or a helicopter, but then stopped the flying object noiselessly, and when all my friends saw the flying object that rose vertically until it was lost quickly in less than a second.
content.summary: Anecdotal sightings

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from eagle river, we pulled up in front of our house. pitch black cloudless sky, very clearly 5+ red lights, unlike any seen before. in line, 1 fell behind, 1 hovered waiting and they both caught up w/the others. these were slow moving. at first my husband and i thought helicopters because they seemed able to stop in mid air. there was no sound of helicopters (which we often see and always hear). they seemed to have come over the mountains and were crossing sw (as far as i could tell). it was completely open sky and we could see nothing in the sky except these small, solid red/orange lights. one per craft. the lights were about the size i would see on a helicopter, but a little smaller, solid, and only one small light. the lights went over the houses out of view after 1-2 minutes. very cool.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pitch black cloudless sky, very clearly 5+ red lights, unlike any seen before. in line, 1 fell behind, 1 hovered waiting and they both caught up w/the others

content.detailedDescription: On this night i had some buddies of mine over for a visit. i live in the out skirts of town in the open country farm area. there were four of us there. it was a very nice warm summer night. i had my guitar out side and plugged into an amp and was playing some tunes for my friends. we were having some beer's and just enjoying the night since it was the weekend. the sky was very clear and the stars were all around. my friends had been there going on about six hours and it was getting to be about 2:00 a.M. in the morning. my mother and step father were out of town and i was staying home alone. we had dairy cows at that time and grew corn. the sky was still clear and all of a sudden the wind started blowing as if a storm was approaching but there wasnt any clouds as we could see. the cows in the barn started acting funny and making noise, like some thing was bothering them. one of my friends then said he was ready to leave because he didnt want to get hit with that storm he thought was comming and needed to get home. so he looked up at the sky and said. that's so strange because he did'nt see any clouds or anything but the the way the wind was acting it should have looked stormy. but he got in his car then pulled out of my long drive way we have and drove off. well right after he left my other two friends decided they were gonna leave also. as they were pulling out of the drive i noticed something big and dark above one of the three corn bins we have and was just hovering above it. i quickly started flashing the house lights on and off to get them to come back and to look at what i was seeing but they never even noticed the thing and just drove off honking the horn good bye. i then turned my attention back to the object and started to walk towards the corn bin were it was hovering. i noticed it was very large and was triangle shaped. it looked bigger than the corn bin. it had some lights kinda pulsating around it. i thought what the heck. i had a beer in my hand as i walked up to it,( no i wasnt drunk ), i was seeing this thing. the beer was in my right hand because im right handed and always use that hand. just as i was staring at this thing, bam! this light hit's me like a spot light, very bright. i can't see anything now. just that light. after i was hit with that light all i remember was the light going back up into the ufo and it just took off like very fast and was gone. now this is the strange part. this all happened at around 2:00 a.M. and was dark outside of course. but now as im standing there the sun is comming up and it's just becomming dawn. and the beer i was holding was now in my left hand and i swear that i never switch it. seem's four hours had passed and i dont remember what happened in between. i feel i was taken aboard or something, and then put back down. i have had bad dreams since then and always about being on some strange table being looked at by aliens. i just wanted to share this story since i feel maybe this may have happened to some one else perhaps and to let them know they are not alone. thank you very much for reading my report.  c. m. from illinois..
content.summary: Ufo sighted and possable abduction.

content.detailedDescription: Driving, see an orange sphere move rapidly upward to almost a stop then a hover like ascend in a diagonal direction then it sped upwards and completely  disappeared
content.summary: Driving, see an orange sphere move rapidly upward to almost a stop then a hover like ascend in a diagonal direction then it sped upwards and completely  disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:20 in the evening on monday, january 23rd i was in the backyard of my home.  i heard a helicopter from uc davis medcenter start up for take off.  about that same time, i looked up and noticed an object with blurry lights pass over the house.  i thought it was a lear jet, but it was followed by no sound.  it was if the boomerang shaped object appeared as if transparent out of the sky, flew over a tree in our backyard and it shot off into space and disappeared.  normally, on such a clear and quiet night, i would hear sounds of some kind, airplanes, etc., but on this night, the ship disappeared without a single sound.  after the experience, i went into the house to tell my husband.  i wasn't afraid, but fascinated that after all these years of looking into the sky at the stars, i had never seen anything like this.  i have to say i was very pleased that it didn't stop and pick me up...:o)
content.summary: Transparent, silent, boomerang-shaped object w/ no green or red lights.

content.detailedDescription: Walking home, overcast and dreary out. felt like something was with us so we looked around, looked up and saw dark, triangle shaped object. i had no clue what it was but it was really freaky looking. i tried to google its shape and got no response. object moved freakishly slow through the sky just above the low overcast clouds. eventually it moved far enough away to where we couldn't see it anymore through the clouds.
content.summary: Dark, black triangle shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to smoke for my birthday when i noticed alot of very bright orange stars that at first i thought was very bright stars. (i could make out 3 triangles of stars) there was a formation to the north south and west.
the one to the north was the one that moved. it moved infront of a few stars and thats when i noticed it was a dark triangle that was moving and not just a few stars.
im hopeing to see it again sometime
content.summary: I saw 3 triangle like craft that moved after while while i was watching

content.detailedDescription: It was getting close to two am and i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette. i always look up at the stars when i go outside because the sky is so clear and they are always so bright. well i look up to the north west and i see what looks to be an aircraft of some sorts because immediately i saw its blinking lights but what was odd was it had headlights on. then when i looked in front of it at first i thought i was seeing a bright star visible through the beam of light but then that light was moving ahead of the aircraft and was making a sharp cut from heading northeast to east. the light on the craft in front didn't and when it made its cut to the east i was able to see an outline of it and it appeared to be boomerang in shape and it had lights on the inside of the wings and none on the outside and those didn't blink either. i continued to watch it being followed by the aircraft behind it until the craft just slowed almost to a stop immediately and as soon as the aircraft from behind got to where the craft was almost hovering it took off with the aircraft from almost not moving to the same speed of the aircraft that had not slowed down. then they moved as one as if they were supposed to.They continued in this fashion until the disappeared over the tree line. what was shocking was neither craft made any noise and they were low enough to where i should of heard something but i didn't. i am an open minded person but also i am very rational in thought so i tried to discredit this with all i had before i could accept i just saw something truly unusual. but i really cant explain what it was. i am also upset that no one was there to see it with me to maybe even help me understand what it may of been but i really was astounded by this craft flying above.
content.summary: Looked as if it was a boomerang or triangle in shape.

content.detailedDescription: calm, clear & quiet country setting when sighted 2 large long oval (cigar shaped) amber lighted objects gliding very slowly, no noise, no trail-7+ min. observation, i moved to yard for view as they crossed over house and lost sight.  objects appeared to be 100+ feet apart and equidistant laterally - one on left was diagonally behind the leader.  objects were traveling in s. e. direction.
content.summary: calm, clear & quiet when sighted 2 long oval amber lighted objects gliding very slowly,no noise,no trail-7+ min, i moved to yard for view as they crossed over house and lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: I am a bit of a stargazer i frequently take time to observe the stars and night skies to watch for strange objects or just look at the stars. one night in either late august or mid september, i do not remember the date clearly. i had a sure feeling i was going to see something strange in the skies and had only been observing for about 5 minutes when i looked to the east and noticed a very bright orange light simply appear headed north  moving at a rapid speed and low altitude the light brightened then the light simply faded like someone blowing out a candle the light just stopped shining, not even 3 seconds after seeing this another light this one being white brightened and appeared at a higher altitude above where the orange light was, this light was moving south, and also moving at a high speed and also faded away in less than 4 seconds. i am not sure what i saw that night but i found it strange how quickly they both appeared within about 15 seconds of eachother and the way they faded in and out intrigued me. rather than seeing a steady light move in from the horizon like a conventional aircraft they simply appeared then dissapeared mid-sky. normally i would disregaurd this sighting but i figured i would report it since i saw two in succession both lights fading in and out both moved in a straight line the orange light headed north appearing first at a lower altitude. about the same altitude you would see a helicopter flying at yet there was no noise, and rather than dissapearing from sight the light faded away. the white light then appeared seconds after, higher in the sky moving in the opposite direction south also fading in and out of sight mid-sky rather than dissapearing over the treeline making no noise. i know these were not comets or meteors for they moved north and south rather than east to west. i am 17 and often skeptical about ufo reports but to this day this sighting remains my most mind boggling observation.
content.summary: Bright orange light appeared/dissapeard headed from south to north followed by white light above headed from north to south

content.detailedDescription: In dec of 2011 while working an overnight shift, a witness and i were outside on the front porch talking enjoying the unseasonably warm weather....When all of a sudden this glowing cylindrical object approximately 200 ft in the air flies over our work place from east to west. this object glowed a pinkish hue, from our standpoint the size of a basketball. i counted approximately 4 seconds before it went out of our eyesight. it made no noise and no other aircraft were in the vicinity at the time. it was a beautiful sight and it shocked both of us because we knew this object was not of this world.
content.summary: A witness and i  observed a cylindrical object which glowed with a pinkish hue sail by our workplace on an overnight shift approx. 3 am. we were on the front porch and seen this object sail from east to west no sound, glowed, within 4 secs left our sight

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 13:00 i was unloading my car with supplies for the office. i happened to gaze north into the beautiful blue skies over lax when a white spherical object caught my eye, about 30 degrees above the horizon, moving fast from east to west. i will liken the speed of the object to what you might expect of a fighter jet on mission. at first i considered it might be a balloon, but the speed was tremendous and the trajectory was straight line to the horizon and unwavering. the size of the object appeared to the eye as about the size of a very small spherical pill. the color was white, but had a metallic quality, as the sunlight seemed to reflect off the surface and i caught a glint or two. because the object was so small i did not want to take my eyes off it for fear of losing it. keeping my eye on the object, i backed to the door of my office and called for some of my colleagues to come out. they came but too late, as the object disappeared from view behind the roof line of a house. i tried to anticipate it's emergence on the other side of the house, but it never showed. i ran a little further down the street to see if i could re-acquire the object, but alas, it was gone. neat little mini-sighting.
content.summary: White orb moving east to west in skies over lax
